name: @formatjs/intl-unified-numberformat
description: Ponyfill for intl unified numberformat proposal
author: Long Ho <holevietlong@gmail.com>

scripts.build:cjs: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 npm run cldr && tsc -b tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.build:additional: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.es6.json && api-extractor run --local && npm run rollup
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:additional
scripts.jest: cross-env NODE_ICU_DATA=../../node_modules/full-icu TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest
